# PI

## Usage

Require `pi`:

```javascript
var pi = require('pi');
```

Log an object:

```javascript
console.log(this);
```

Log nothing, _twice_:

Another comment.

```javascript
console.log();
console.log();
```

A commented log: `console.log()`.

A final comment, missing an EOL.

```markdown
Some **thing**.
```
